動物用藥品名稱: 貝歐克雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎活毒混合疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
地址: S.S 234 PER CREMONA, KM 28, 2 27013 CHIGNOLO PO (PAVIA) ITALY
效能(適應症): 預防雞新城雞瘟及傳染性支氣管炎。
成分: BIO B1 - H120  VACCINE IS MADE WITH A LIVE  ATTENUATED  VIRUS OFAVAIN INFECTIOUS BRONCHITIS ( H120 STRAIN ), LIVE ATTENUATED VIRUS(STRAIN B1) REPLICATED IN SPF EGGS, FREEZE-DRIED AND UNDER  VACUUMSEALED.MINIMUM TITER IS  10^6 EID50 FOR THE NEWCASTLE B1 STRAIN AND 10^3EID50 FOR THE H120 STRAIN.
